mcq.statement: In which year did Maulana Muhammad Ali Jauhar start publishing the newspaper Comrade from Calcutta?
mcq.one_liner: Maulana Muhammad Ali Jauhar began publishing the newspaper Comrade from Calcutta in **1911**.

suggestions.topic: Services of Sir Syed Ahmad Khan (1817-1898)
Muhammad Ali Jinnah and Muslim League (1913)
